Stapfochloa bụ ụdị ahịhịa. Ọ dịkwa na ngalaba ezinụlọ nke Chloridoideae, na agbụrụ Cynodonteae.

Ebe isi  o sitere na Texas (USA) na Mexico, na mpaghara okpomọkụ nke mpaghara okirikiri South America (n'ime mba Argentina, Bahamas, Belize, Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Cuba, Dominican Republic, Guyana, Haiti, Jamaica, Leeward Islands, Netherlands Antilles, Nicaragua, Paraguay, Puerto Rico, Uruguay, Venezuela na Windward Islands) yana mpaghara okpomanya Africa (n'etiti Burkina, Cameroon, Chad, Ethiopia, Kenya, Mali, Mauritania, Nigeria, Sudan, Tanzania na Uganda).

Aha ụdị nke Stapfochloa bụ na sọpụrụ Otto Stapf (1857 ruo 1933]]), onye  na akụ osisi na na onye ma gbasara nchịkọta osisivamuru na Australia. 
A kọwara ya na mbụ ma bipụta ya na Willdenowia ụda nke iri atọ na anọ  na peeji nke otu narị na iri atọ na otu na  afọ 2004.

Dị ka Kew si kwuo;{{linked species list|Stapfochloa berroi|(Arechav.) P.M.Peterson|Stapfochloa canterae|(Arechav.) P.M.Peterson|Stapfochloa ciliata|(Sw.) P.M.Peterson|Stapfochloa elata|(Desv.) P.M.Peterson|Stapfochloa grandiflora|(Roseng
& Izag.) Wipff & Shaw|Stapfochloa lamproparia|(Stapf) H.Scholz|Stapfochloa parodiana|(Roseng

Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo nke United States na Ọrụ Nnyocha Ọrụ Ugbo na-amata ụdị ahụ, ha depụtara naanị ụdị ndị a; Stapfochloa berroi, Stapfochlochloa canterae, Stapfocloa ciliata, Stapfohloa elata na Stapfochaloa lamproparia.
